"Try gathering enemies together into one place with Zondeel!"

"・Cast Zondeel with <%PhotonArts> to gather
\u3000all enemies into one place"

"・Cast Zondeel with <%PhotonArts> to gather
\u3000all enemies into one place"

"Zondeel is a Lightning-attribute Technique which generates an electromagnetic field that pulls nearby enemies into its center.

After the initial cast, it remains in place and continues to draw enemies in for a short time.

Casting another Lightning-attribute Technique within the area of an active Zondeel causes it to explode and disappear."
